tourBios.carHigh:
2014: Began his season by missing the cut at the Mission Hills Haikou Open…In his next start two weeks later, finished T23 at the Buick Open, closing with rounds of 70-71 to finish at even-par 288…Played on the weekend for a second consecutive start, this time at the United Investment Real Estate Wuhan Open, where he T62…Missed the cut at the Lanhai Open...At the Earls Beijing Open, began the event with a 1-over 73 at Earls GC. Played his final 54 holes in 5-under (69-71-71) to T36…Opened 1-under through 54 holes of the OneAsia Tour's Nanshan China Masters (71-72-69) before firing a final-round 76 during severely windy conditions on the final day at Nanshan International GC. Finished T17.   
2013: Attempted to qualify for the Volvo China Open but missed the invitation by shooting 76-72…Finished second at U.S. Open local qualifying in Orlando, Fla., two strokes behind Brandyn Schneider at Shingle Creek GC. Didn't qualify for the U.S. Open when he was T32 at the sectional qualifier in Bradenton, Fla…Missed the cut at the European Challenge Tour's Foshan Open, the China Masters, the Volvo China Open and the Australian Open. 
2012: Missed the cut at the SK Telecom Open, the China Open and the Maekyung Open Golf Championship. 
2011: Missed the cut at the Volvo China Open.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Finished 27th at the Asian Amateur Championship.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA Tour China Serie was T23rd in 2014 at the Buick Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T48th in Total Eagles on the PGA Tour China Series.
